hero.title: Intelligent Software Solutions
hero.subtitle: End-to-end software development and digital transformation services across Healthcare, Industry 4.0, AI, and Medical Technology domains.

services.title: Healthcare Solutions
services.description: Digital transformation for healthcare providers with cutting-edge medical technology integration, HIPAA-compliant systems, and telemedicine platforms.

services.title: Industry 4.0
services.description: Smart manufacturing solutions with IoT integration, predictive maintenance, real-time monitoring, and data-driven automation for operational excellence.

services.title: Artificial Intelligence
services.description: Advanced AI/ML solutions using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and modern frameworks for intelligent automation, computer vision, and natural language processing.

services.title: Custom IT Services
services.description: End-to-end software development with modern tech stacks including React, Python, Node.js, cloud-native architectures, and DevOps practices.

portfolio.title: MedConnect - Telemedicine Platform
portfolio.description: Comprehensive telemedicine platform serving 50,000+ patients with real-time consultations, prescription management, and integrated EHR systems.

portfolio.title: SmartFactory Analytics
portfolio.description: IoT-enabled manufacturing analytics platform that reduced operational costs by 35% through predictive maintenance and real-time monitoring.

portfolio.title: AI-Powered Fraud Detection
portfolio.description: Machine learning system processing millions of transactions daily with 99.8% accuracy in fraud detection for financial institutions.

testimonials.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
testimonials.feedback: Anoxes transformed our healthcare platform with cutting-edge AI integration. Their expertise in medical technology and HIPAA compliance is unmatched.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.feedback: The Industry 4.0 solutions provided by Anoxes revolutionized our manufacturing processes. Their IoT integration reduced downtime by 60%.
